EmailTemplate.subject: Leverage lessons learned from successful public-private hybrid clouds
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Use cases based on multiple SUCCESSFUL cloud implementations Hello {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
Avoid the pitfalls associated with developing a new cloud architecture yourself and leverage what others have learned along the way.
Read the use case “Public-private cloud for large enterprises <[[https://pages.nokia.com/T001XT_Hybrid.Cloud.LargeEnterprise.LP.html?did=d000000000aw&utm_campaign=gamechanger&utm_source=nurture&utm_medium=email&utm_content=email 6a-hybridcloudforleusecase&utm_term=general]]>” to learn how the Nokia overlay cloud solution has been successfully applied across multiple implementations. You’ll discover how you can:
- Upgrade your large enterprise environment into a private cloud without needing a forklif - Provide access to public cloud as part of a hybrid cloud approach - Reduce total cost of ownership (TCO) by at least 25 percent!
I hope that you enjoy this use case! Michael Williams
